::KitKat::

Smiles and nods.  She whispers to him,"I'd love to. But it willhave 
to wait until we have the time."  She smiled.

She looked at GoldenEye.  "Do you need to go tot he CR chamber, were 
you damaged in the crash?"

> ::DrillBit::

> He turned to KitKat.

food,
> and things; and go out on a picnic. That sound nice?" He asked, 
KitKat.
> He was falling more and more in love, with her.
